title: Pixel 4a battery draining quickly after December update. 7.7% battery wear overnight. Now what?
content: Battery draining much faster after December update. Went from 0% to 7.7% battery wear overnight. Battery was lasting over a day. Now have to charge it twice a day. Phone also warm and sometimes hot when not in use. Phone usage has not changed. No app problems showing up in settings. What is happening?
